channel.title: NewExile(edit)
channel.description:
NewExile!
A brand new RSPS in search of staff (including coder)
You may have noticed this server posted before but it was bugged and wouldnt connect to the server but I believe I fixed it. If there is ANY problems please pm me via my mopar account. Loyalty Titles including- "Lord" "Lady" "Sir" "Dame" "Duderino" "Dudette" "Lionheart" "Crusader" "Hellraiser" "Desperado" "Baron" "Baroness" "Count" "Countess" "Donator" "Super Donator" "Extreme Donator" "Moderator" "Administrator" "Head Admin" "Co Owner" "Owner" "Queen" "Legit"
We have 99% working animations 317 graphics Revision 700+ items Multiple GameFrames 100% korasi All Specs working Death cape only custom Classic and advanced bosses such as Nomad Avatar of destruction Lahkrahnaz And more 100% skilling Modified to perfection exp rate Barrage 90% "Four Keys" Dungeoneering Torva Pernix Virtus Dungeoneering exp lamp 100% Primal 100% chaotics Minigames 90% Shops at home Teleports 100% Dicing 100%!!!
Download- http://uppit.com/gq02cuyxgq77/NewExile_client.rar
Forums - http://newexile317.createaforum.com/index.php?action=forum
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2n9x9ut.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1670py.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ex8y93.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ex8y93.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2aokuw.jpg[/img]]
More pics soon to come!

item.title: NewExile(edit)
item.dc:creator: @Josephx Josephx
item.description:
@Josephx wrote:

k Ik I have spent a bit modifying things like exp rate and titles and such but I honestly wanted to see what would happen if I posted as it is Its mlike an alpha stage there will be take downs for edits and such but for now going to keep it up writing down reported bugs and in future hopefully I will have made a good server but I need online to see what players want you know?

Read full topic

item.title: NewExile(edit)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Josephx, post:10, topic:455079”]Im still an amateur with java so this is more or less a project :P[/quote]generally speaking projects are not hosted until a period where it is stable enough to go public.

if you are an amateur then perhaps this should be in server development

Read full topic

item.description:

Josephx:

Their arent pics of that as of now but youll see it if you join the server

That’s like if a company just started releasing lemonade, but only told people what they’d seen a million times before…

Something like “Oh it’s yellow! Try it to get the full experience!”
